Replying to @mattyfromle 2021-05-04 13:15
@mattyfromle @Netlify The way that Netlify creates the endpoint that forms can then post to, is by looking for form elements in the html during the build. So if the form is rendered client-side only, then it won't get detected. Seen this? https://t.co/S6NtluQG5x
